title: No serializer found for class org.jboss.resteasy.reactive.client.impl.ClientResponseImp

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

"java.lang.RuntimeException: com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidDefinitionException: No serializer found for class org.jboss.resteasy.reactive.client.impl.ClientResponseImpl and no properties discovered to create BeanSerializer (to avoid exception, disable SerializationFeature.FAIL_ON_EMPTY_BEANS). This appears to be a native image, in which case you may need to configure reflection for the class that is to be serialized\n\tat
